title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo: The Salman Khan movie is about an innocent man and a princess
text: The trailer of Salman Khan's much awaited film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo is finally here. Salman Khan & Sooraj Barjatya come together after a span of 16 years to... Filmy Friday 6 hours ago - Entertainment After 16 years, Salman Khan and Sooraj Barjatya are back with Prem Ratan Dhan Payo. As we predicted, the trailer is a montage of important scenes and songs... DNA 6 hours ago - Front Page Salman gets candid about the controversial reality show Bigg Boss 9 and his new film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo… Salman Khan is a busy man these days. Bollywood Life 13 hours ago - India Also reported by • Mid-Day You Might Like Other recent news in Entertainment
